General.Name: Tonkens Agrar AG
General.Description: Tonkens Agrar AG operates as an agricultural company in Germany. It cultivates, stores, processes, and markets cash crops, grains, potatoes, corns, and onions, as well as produces milk. The company also generates energy from biogas plants and solar energy. It has a cultivated area of approximately 3,500 hectares. The company serves the food industry and wholesalers. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Sülzetal, Germany.

0.Name: Mr. Gerrit  Tonkens
